(requires attunement by Davis Cantrell)

Forged in the ancient forge deep within the Snoring Mountain with a fragment of Agni and Davis Cantrell's will along with mementos from Davis and his companions, this blade is one-of-a-kind. Along the shaft of this beautiful full-metal glaive, the story of Davis's fall from grace through temptation and deception and eventual redemption through his companionship and collaboration with his loved ones is detailed in beautiful etchings and other fine metalwork. Its full name is "The Bond-Forged Paths of Redemption, from Floating Ash to Hardened Steel".

You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon which does not require attunement.

Forge Armor. If you attune to this weapon, as an action, you can use it to cast @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.7uLBk0MRAiNUHKR6]{Armor of Agathys (The Redeemer)}, but instead of cold damage the type of damage is both radiant and fire damage and whichever damage is higher against each target applies. The level of the spell is equal to your proficiency modifier. This property can be used twice and recharges fully at dawn.

Armor Beam. You get the @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.magic-items.Item.RCwuJU4cKCTaVeqP]{Armor Beam} feature.

Mortal Wounds. When you deal damage with this weapon, the creature takes extra damage equal to one of its hit dice.

In addition, if you attune to this weapon it becomes bound to you. With no action required you may choose to dismiss this weapon. Additionally, this weapon disappears if it is more than 5 feet away from you for 1 minute or more. It also disappears if you die. You may resummon this weapon at will as an action, or as part of an Attack action.

Foundry Note

Upon attuning to this weapon, you will have to manually add @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.7uLBk0MRAiNUHKR6]{Armor of Agathys (The Redeemer)} and @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.magic-items.Item.RCwuJU4cKCTaVeqP]{Armor Beam} to your character sheet.
